response.job_title: Ingeniero Industrial, Universidad Nacional de Colombia con doble titulacíon de ingeniería con énfasis en Management e Innovación de la Universidad de Lorraine. Project Manager en Gradiweb.

Desarrollo y elaboracion de un plan de inversiones plurianual para la reparacion y mejora de la infraestructura.
Metodología AHP y Dematel para elección de prioridades.
Evaluación de la capacidad de innovación dentro de la empresa.
profile_positions.title: Jefe de Proyecto Inmobiliario

company.name: Gradiweb - Web Agency
company.description:
Want to attract your target audience and increase the number of your happy clients?

We create digital marketing strategies that do just that. 

Our digital marketing strategies work as a guide through the sales funnel. They take your targets by the hand and lead them through all the stations of the funnel. The final destination is where they convert into  happy clients and brand promoters. 

We tailor our strategies to each of our client's audience and objectives. They might consist of some or all of the following components: 

- Branding
- Website Design
- E-commerce and Marketplace
- Landing pages for ad campaigns
- Content Marketing & Lead Nurturing (creation of different content types for each station of the sales funnel: blog posts, infographics, ebooks, white papers, presentations etc.)
- Social Media Marketing
- Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
- Influencer Marketing
- Link Building Strategies
- Email Marketing
- Search Engine Marketing (SEM)

Are you ready to watch your reputation and sales climb up? We are! Get in touch!
